评论概述: Toddler looked so handsome in this!

The shirt and vest fit perfect and the pants were very long for my son so we had to go with khakis we already had but I will use these ones when he is older. The bowtie wouldn't stay straight or tight around his neck so it'd be slightly crooked but I fixed it for pictures and all was good! Great product for the price and I'd recommend it!
Pants are elastic waist and seemed true to size providing a good fit.

评论概述: "Stylish Sophistication: Nautica Boys 4-Piece Vest Set Review"
评论详情: "Nautica Boys 4-Piece Vest Set epitomizes quality and style. From the impeccably crafted dress shirt and coordinating tie to the sleek vest and pants, each element exudes sophistication. The fabric feels luxurious yet durable, ensuring comfort and longevity. Whether it's a formal event or a special occasion, this ensemble elevates any young gentleman's look effortlessly. With meticulous attention to detail and Nautica's reputation for excellence, parents can trust that their little ones will not only look sharp but also feel confident in this impeccably tailored outfit."

Super cute. Good quality for the money. Love it!! Bought two variations. Elastic pants were key. I have a skinny tall 5yo and all other sets didn’t fit well/pants fell down. The shirt fit was peculiar- a lil tight around neck & vest-mid torso but shirt sleeves were super long.  I ended up leaving top button open on shirt & covered with the bow-tie so nobody would notice.  Also, only fastened one button on vest & folded up the sleeves at wrist...Overall, it served it's purpose but probably will not be in my son's wardrobe for long.

评论概述: Suit Fit Proportionally Well With Great Quality
评论详情: I purchased 6 suits for a formal event for my 5 yr old. First two were china made brands and I received what is to be expected (extremely large pants and I thought the vest clasp was cheap).  I ordered 4 more name brand suits (Nautica, Van Heusen, and IZOD), all size 5- stretchy waistband and no clasp on vest. They were identically made (same cut, style, material, tags, country, etc). This Nautica suit in gray was my favorite, but he ultimately chose a blue one.  5 yr old, approx 40-45 lbs: Waistband fit great (my son has 21” waist), length was perfect (som has 18” inseam), vest and shirt were great with a little extra length to grow (son’s chest is 22”). Suit fit proportionally overall, with room to grow up a couple inches. Recommend buying it.
Outfit looks great. Good quality. Bought a size 10, fits more like a size 8 so had to return because it didn't fit.
Nice clothes fit great
